name: Sulphur Brigand
description:
Break into a heavily guarded castle, plunder it's treasures and defeat the evil lord. You will face many dangers in the form of nasty enemies and deadly traps. But fear not... for you can upgrade your weapon, collect treasures to gain more lives and blast through locked gates.

FEATURES:

-14 colour graphics

-9 types of enemies

-30 rooms to explore

-Bomb throwing physics

-Music by Torvus
